title: Axway to Discuss Overcoming Agility Challenges of the Digital Economy at SIBOS 2015
text:
Experts Reveal How to Enable Omni-channel Strategies and Quickly Leverage New Financial Services
Phoenix, AZ (PRWEB) September 29, 2015
As immediate payment services became inevitable in order to maintain competitive advantage, financial institutions are wrestling with technology challenges while adapting existing services to address personalized customers’ needs. Axway (Euronext: AXW.PA), a market leader in governing the flow of data, today announced company experts will speak at Swift International Banking Operations Seminar ( SIBOS ), the world’s premier financial services event regarding revolution in payments.
Payment occurs when interactions with customers create value; the more seamless the method, the more value is created. Actually, payment today is now a commodity, meaning that it has no value if not linked with other services. Bruno Cambounet, Vice President Financial Services and Insurance Industries, at Axway will be speaking at Open Theatre about the importance of establishing a scalable, secure digital business foundation to adapt to change, respond to customer demands and to bring innovative new services to market.
During the Open Theater, Axway’s expert will discuss:
 Why does digitalization of business bring uncertainty? What does it mean in terms of ecosystem integration? What are the major challenges that banks are facing in their digital transformation journey?
Visit Axway at booth # H43.

About Axway
Axway (Euronext: AXW.PA), a market leader in governing the flow of data, is a global software company with more than 11,000 public- and private-sector customers in 100 countries.
For more than a decade, Axway has empowered leading organizations around the world with proven solutions that help manage business-critical interactions through the exchange of data flowing across the enterprise, among B2B communities, cloud and mobile devices. Our award-winning solutions span business-to-business integration, managed file transfer, operational intelligence, API and identity management, and email security– offered on premise and in the Cloud with professional and managed services. Axway is registered in France with headquarters in the United States and offices in 19 countries. http://www.axway.com

Axway 5 Suite offers control and optimization of the flow of data through integration, visibility, policy, security and reliability to govern business-to-business interactions, communities, systems and data types – within and beyond the enterprise edge.
